column1: {% assign acceptable = "wwc,nonwwc,wizard,prewwc" | split: "," %}{% assign sunlight_docs = site.documents | where_exp: "item", "acceptable contains item.sunlight" | sort: "date" %}{% for doc in sunlight_docs %}{% assign the_place = site.places | where: "place", doc.place | first %}{{ the_place.title }}
